channel.title: Art on Home on Rails
channel.description: Recent content in Art on Home on Rails

item.title: Monthly Art #29
item.description: This is a monthly “newsletter”, containing a list of what I enjoyed the most last month. Whether it was a full length movie, short film, music album, book or even a painting.

item.title: Route in Ecuador
item.description:
(image credit: https://www.flickr.com/photos/wurglitsch/9466325427)

This route was suggested to me by girl from Ecuador (thanks Carla), whom I met in Mexico on Dec. 10, 2017.

1st: spend 1 or 2 days in Quito: go to Centro Hist√≥rico and have a locro de papa.
